briefTitle: NEAT!2 Sedentary Behavior Reduction for Individuals With Past or Present Knee Symptoms, Injuries, or Surgeries
officialTitle: NEAT!2 Sedentary Behavior Reduction Intervention for Individuals With Past or Present Knee Symptoms, Injuries, or Surgeries

protocolDocument.label: Study Protocol and Statistical Analysis Plan

eligibilityCriteria.criteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Be at least 40 years of age
* Own an Android or Apple smartphone
* Have their smartphone near them (in their pocket, in their hand, or within 10 feet of them) for \>50% of their waking day
* Be willing to download the study application and be compatible on their smartphone
* Spend at least 7 hours/day sitting
* Have at least 4 days of valid accelerometer data at baseline
* Have knee pain (at least one knee with pain, aching, or stiffness on most days for one month of the last 12 months), knee injury, or knee replacement within the last 5 years
* Read, speak, and understand English

Exclusion Criteria:

* Have any contraindications to activity
* Have a mobility limiting comorbidity
* Have a scheduled surgery within the next 6 months

primary.measure: Change in Sedentary Behavior at 1 Month
primary.description: Daily sedentary behavior objectively measured by activpal

primary.measure: Change in Sedentary Behavior at 3 Months
primary.description: Daily sedentary behavior objectively measured by activpal

secondary.measure: Change in Timed Up & Go at 1 Month
secondary.description: Physical function assessed by Timed Up \& Go (seconds)

secondary.measure: Change in Chair Stands at 1 Month
secondary.description: Physical function assessed by Chair Stand Test (# stands in 30 seconds)

secondary.measure: Change in 6 Minute Walk at 1 Month
secondary.description: Physical function assessed by 6 minute walk (total feet)

secondary.measure: Change in Timed Up & Go at 3 Months
secondary.description: Physical function assessed by Timed Up \& Go (seconds)

secondary.measure: Change in Chair Stands at 3 Months
secondary.description: Physical function assessed by Chair Stand Test (# stands in 30 seconds)

secondary.measure: Change in 6 Minute Walk at 3 Months
secondary.description: Physical function assessed by 6 minute walk (total feet)

other.measure: Maintenance of Changes in Sedentary Behavior at 6 Months
other.description: Daily sedentary behavior objectively measured by activpal
